title: The One About Teamwork
description:
On this episode of Sibling Rivalry Bob and Monét explore what teamwork means to them. Tune in to hear about what they have to say about the backlash they've gotten from Sibling Watchery, why Bob had to boil a dead cat in high school, the perks of being similar in size, and much much more!
This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Sibling Rivalry listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/RIVALRY
Visit PrettyLitter.com and use promo code RIVALRY for 20% OFF your FIRST ORDER!
